# Preface {.unnumbered}

### Welcome !

This book is part of my project I call [Katieum](https://github.com/Katleho-Nyoni/Grade_12-Visual), that uses animation to teach Mathematics and Physical Sciences to Grade 12 learners of South Africa. Click to check the [demo](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XwBtjpcyG-8).

#### NOTE :

This is an on-going project. The resources used will be cited. Slowly but surely, step by step. **Enjoy!**
